8. Nectarine and Jet-Ski have the same parity positions. Since the Jet-Ski can't be in position 1 (because of rule 10), it must be in position 2, 4, or 5.

10. The Jet-Ski is on the far left or far right. Since the Jet-Ski can't be in position 1 (because of rule 9), it must be in position 5. This means Cherry is in position 1, and Tram is in position 3.

11. Subway is to the right of Nectarine. Since the Subway is in position 3, Nectarine must be in position 2.

12. Water is to the left of Milk. Since Water is in position 1, Milk must be in position 4.

13. Lemonade is to the right of 7up. Since Lemonade is in position 4, 7up must be in position 2.
